title: The wonderful world of the Bronze mentality
body:
So this is the attitude you get from Bronze/Silver players, apparently this players main is Platinum 3, so on top of his trolling he goes and does that. She didn't even play bad, none of us did except the AFK and said nothing in game.

http://i.imgur.com/ybkPmWi.png

Game before that I was trying to give the 3 game Yorick (playing in ranked with 3 games TOTAL) some actual advice, he flamed me and rudely told me to AFK, he knows what he is doing with his 1000 ranked games... still being in Silver.

You can't even breath wrong in this ranking.
